Ad Text:
This Senior Business Analyst role leads complex change across AML and Transaction Monitoring, with a focus on strengthening systems, processes, and controls to improve financial crime risk management. You will own end-to-end delivery of AML initiatives, translating regulatory requirements into practical, scalable solutions across Compliance, Risk, Operations, Data, and Technology.

In this role you will:

Lead and deliver AML and Transaction Monitoring transformation initiatives end-to-end.
Redesign and optimise monitoring frameworks, controls, and operating models.
Drive enhancements to transaction monitoring systems, case management, and reporting.
Identify structural inefficiencies and control gaps, and develop remediation roadmaps.
You will be successful if you have:

5+ years’ experience in AML, Financial Crime, or Transaction Monitoring with proven transformation delivery.
Strong understanding of monitoring systems, case management platforms, and AML regulatory frameworks.
Demonstrated ability to operate in complex, multi-stakeholder environments and influence senior stakeholders.
Advanced analytical capability and a track record of delivering sustainable control and operating model change.
If this aligns with your experience and you are looking to drive meaningful AML transformation, please apply.

Ascend Recruit is partnering with a highly regarded and growing financial services firm based in beautiful Noosa to appoint a driven and commercially astute Financial Analyst.

This is an outstanding opportunity for an analytical professional who enjoys working closely with leadership, providing meaningful insights, and influencing strategic decision-making within a dynamic business.
The Role Reporting directly to senior leadership, you will be responsible for delivering accurate financial analysis, forecasting, and reporting to support business performance and growth initiatives.

Key responsibilities include:

Preparing financial models, forecasts and budgets
Analysing business performance and identifying trends and opportunities
Providing strategic insights and recommendations to leadership
Assisting with cashflow management and financial planning
Supporting reporting requirements and improving internal financial processes
Working collaboratively across teams to enhance commercial outcomes
About You
3+ years’ experience in a Financial Analyst or similar commercial finance role
Strong financial modelling and advanced Excel skills
CA/CPA qualified or working towards (preferred)
Commercially minded with strong analytical capability
Excellent communication skills and ability to present insights clearly
High attention to detail and strong problem-solving skills
Why This Role?
Competitive salary package ($90,000 – $130,000 + Super)
Work in a collaborative, forward-thinking business
Beautiful Noosa location with lifestyle balance
Opportunity to contribute to strategic growth
If you’re ready to step into a role where your analysis truly makes an impact, we’d love to hear from you

Send your CV and Cover letter to Lauren@ascendrecruit.com.au or call Lauren Ostler for more information.

Lauren Ostler
0413 085 250

Job Title: Commercial Finance Analyst - Global Marketing Agency
Ad Text:
Our client
High growth global marketing agency. They've got operations nationwide and have shown great expansion across their multiple states. A closely knit and stable team with excellent leadership. 

This role reports and works closely with an experienced CFO.

This role would suit a high achieving Senior Analyst ready to step into their first management role.

The role

Business partnering - provide value add analysis and support in addressing profitability opportunities and challenges.
Responsible for annual budget and rolling quarterly forecast
Provide insights and develop tools to support business management to make informed assessments for strategic cost and pricing decisions.
Pricing and margin reviews of various sales channels and promotional product campaigns         
Capital investment reviews for proposed new products and existing product upgrade investments to be submitted for Board approval   
Preparation of papers for board submissions

About you

Experience in a fast paced environment is essential - retail, FMCG, ecommerce, marketing, media, etc.
Strong experience with analysis and financial planing (budget/forecast). 
Proven experience business partnering with non-finance stakeholders - providing revenue generating insights and recommendations 
At least 3+ years of experience in commercial finance role/s  
 

For more information contact Schenuk Wijesekera on 02 9775 5916 or apply using the "Apply" button.
